document.full_text: even before the sept. 11 attacks on the united states, part of africa has been haunted by osama bin laden's men, who have killed hundreds of civilians and wounded thousands more.
document.title: for many africans, bin laden's death was a long time coming
lines_and_colors: even before the sept. 11 attacks on the united states, part of africa has been haunted by osama bin laden's men, who have killed hundreds of civilians and wounded thousands more.
